dialogue.intro: Hi there! I'm Rosie. I run the bakery in town!
dialogue.low: Oh, hello. Can I help you with something?
dialogue.mid: Good to see you, friend! How's the farm?
dialogue.high: You're my favorite farmer! I saved you a fresh pastry!

dialogue.intro: What do you want? I'm busy. Name's Grim.
dialogue.mid: Hmph. You're not so bad, I guess.
dialogue.high: ...You're alright, kid. Here, take this â€” I made it for you.

dialogue.intro: Oh! I didn't see you there... I'm Willow.
dialogue.low: H-hi... Did you need a book?
dialogue.mid: I found a passage about ancient farming techniques. Want to hear?
dialogue.high: I... I look forward to seeing you every day.

dialogue.intro: Well hey there! Name's Pete. Pull up a chair, the fish ain't bitin' anyway.
dialogue.low: Nice day for fishin', ain't it?
dialogue.mid: You know, you remind me of myself when I was young.
dialogue.high: Here, take my lucky rod. You've earned it, friend.

dialogue.intro: Welcome to our town! I'm Mayor Hart. We're glad to have a new farmer.
dialogue.low: Good day, citizen. Everything in order?
dialogue.mid: The town has really benefited from your contributions.
dialogue.high: You're an honorary citizen now. This town wouldn't be the same without you.

dialogue.intro: Hello! I'm Dr. Fern. I take care of all the animals around here.
dialogue.low: Remember to take good care of your animals!
dialogue.mid: Your animals seem really happy. You're doing great!
dialogue.high: You have such a gift with animals. I could learn from you!
